text: "Driving Wheels" is a 1988 song by Australian singer Jimmy Barnes and is the second single from his third studio album Freight Train Heart. It went to number 19 in New Zealand and number 12 in Australia. ==Track listing== 7" single (K 488) /12" single (X 13308)''' *Side A "Driving Wheels" - 5:19 *Side B "Different Lives" - 3:36 ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:Jimmy Barnes songs
title: Driving Wheels
